column5: Start Dates: September, OctoberIncrease your confidence working with data and develop your managerial skills for the fast-paced business world with this specialist MSc Business and Management (Business Analytics).MSc Business and Management (Business Analytics) OverviewData is used in all areas of business â€“ from marketing and sales to product development to customer service and beyond. As more and more data is gathered by businesses, insightful analysis of information gathered and its application to decision making will be essential for business success. Candidates who have relevant analytics knowledge will stand out from their peers.
